name: IELTS Essential Vocabulary
description: Top 10 most common words for IELTS Speaking and Writing.

flashcards.definition: Dồi dào, phong phú, nhiều hơn mức cần thiết.
flashcards.exampleSentence: There is abundant evidence that cars have a harmful effect on the environment.

flashcards.definition: Nhàm chán, tầm thường, thiếu tính độc đáo.
flashcards.exampleSentence: He just sat there making banal remarks all evening.

flashcards.definition: Âm thanh hỗn độn, chói tai, không hòa hợp.
flashcards.exampleSentence: As we entered the farmyard we were met with a cacophony of animal sounds.

flashcards.definition: Không sợ hãi, gan dạ và quyết tâm.
flashcards.exampleSentence: The dauntless firefighters ran into the burning building to save the children.

flashcards.definition: Đa dạng, chọn lọc từ nhiều nguồn hoặc phong cách khác nhau.
flashcards.exampleSentence: His musical tastes are eclectic, ranging from hard rock to classical.

flashcards.definition: Làm cho việc gì đó trở nên dễ dàng hoặc thuận tiện hơn.
flashcards.exampleSentence: The new ramp will facilitate the entry of wheelchairs.

flashcards.definition: Nói nhiều, lắm lời, đặc biệt về những chuyện không quan trọng.
flashcards.exampleSentence: I had a garrulous neighbour who wouldn't stop talking about her cats.

flashcards.definition: Tôn vinh hoặc coi là linh thiêng.
flashcards.exampleSentence: The church stands on hallowed ground.

flashcards.definition: Người thách thức hoặc phá bỏ những niềm tin, tập tục được tôn sùng.
flashcards.exampleSentence: Rogers, an iconoclast in architecture, is sometimes described as creative and sometimes as merely eccentric.

flashcards.definition: Mệt mỏi, chán nản hoặc mất hứng thú do trải qua quá nhiều.
flashcards.exampleSentence: Use something exciting to liven up your jaded appetite.

name: Everyday Phrasal Verbs
description: Useful phrasal verbs for daily conversation.

flashcards.definition: Hủy bỏ một kế hoạch hoặc sự kiện.
flashcards.exampleSentence: They had to call off the meeting because the boss was sick.

flashcards.definition: Bình tĩnh lại, bớt tức giận hoặc căng thẳng.
flashcards.exampleSentence: You need to calm down before you drive the car.

flashcards.definition: Bắt kịp hoặc theo kịp ai đó.
flashcards.exampleSentence: You'll have to run fast to catch up with him.

flashcards.definition: Làm thủ tục đăng ký (khách sạn, sân bay).
flashcards.exampleSentence: We checked in at the hotel as soon as we arrived.

flashcards.definition: Làm lại từ đầu.
flashcards.exampleSentence: My teacher made me do my homework over because it was messy.

flashcards.definition: Ăn ở nhà hàng thay vì ăn ở nhà.
flashcards.exampleSentence: We didn't feel like cooking so we decided to eat out.

flashcards.definition: Tìm ra, hiểu ra hoặc giải quyết được vấn đề.
flashcards.exampleSentence: I need to figure out how to fix this computer.

flashcards.definition: Bỏ cuộc, ngừng cố gắng.
flashcards.exampleSentence: She didn't give up even though the race was hard.

flashcards.definition: Đi chơi, dành thời gian thư giãn cùng bạn bè.
flashcards.exampleSentence: We like to hang out at the park on weekends.

flashcards.definition: Chờ một chút.
flashcards.exampleSentence: Hold on a minute while I find my keys.
